articles.title: Milan-Como, Leao equals a goal: the numbers of the Portuguese
articles.summary: Milan did not go beyond a 1-1 draw in the home match against Como. With this result, the Rossoneri remain -7 behind Inter.

articles.summary: There was hope that AC Milan could fire their way back into the Scudetto race with a win against Como on Wednesday. articles.title: Leao has no intention of giving up: "It's not about sprints, it's a marathon"
articles.summary: Rafael Leao, AC Milan striker, expressed himself like this on Instagram after the draw against Como, posting some photos from San Siro: "It's not about sprinting, it's a marathon".

articles.title: Allegri after Como: "We can turn the table upside down"
articles.summary: Only 1-1 for Milan at San Siro against Como. A bitter draw, with Inter now 7 points ahead.

articles.title: Milan, the road to the derby. We need a full haul, hoping that Inter waste energy during the week
articles.summary: A draw that is of little use to Milan. The Rossoneri did not go beyond a 1-1 draw against Como and thus see Inter extend their lead at the top of the table.
